resources.string:
Sorry to disappoint you, but pictures showed in this app are made in Hollywood studio.. 
 People wake up! The Earth is flat! 
 However there is a slight possibility that it is round, but it's hollow inside and that's where humanoid reptiles live. 
 On the other hand, we must be sceptical about everything so there is no denying that there is a small chance that the Earth is round and filled with rocky stuff, implying that scientific evidence are legit; implying that there is a possibility that NASA is telling the truth; implying that those pictures were indeed taken on Mars! 
 Although, there is 'lying' in 'implying'... 
 -App made by Sandro-
Please input sol in range 1 - 2208, and choose rover
